transcript.text: Shalom Shalom Shalom this is daniel john
lee with poorer restoration ministries
it is December the second 2013 the 29th
day have the 8p per month Monday back to
psu and what what an amazing surreal day
it was I got out there earlier than
normal because you know or now the last
two weeks of classes this is the last
full week of class then next week as
their finals this is the last few days
I'll be able to preach at PSU before all
hell breaks loose on Hanukkah when
Satan's cast out of the heavenly throne
room so I wanted to make my days count
so I got there early I got there around
eleven twenty in the morning stades
almost two o'clock it's almost three
hours three flowers is preaching my
heart out started off just preaching on
some 119 just proclaiming it and for the
first 45 minutes the crowd was very
small maybe only a handful of students
as the conviction of the spirit just
fell upon you know maybe 10 12 students
but then around noon or so going into
the twelve o'clock hour as I began to
continue to preach on Yahshua his blood
atonement the Torah obeying him
eventually the police showed up the
police just showed up two police cars
showed up writing on campus and the
crowd started getting big and big and
big until it got up to maybe 7,500 maybe
over 100 students there was one woman
who was contentious you know that I had
to rebuke but she didn't stay long the
cop stayed for maybe 30 or 45 minutes
and then they eventually drove away and
then as I was beginning to preach and I
had a few arrogant atheists and things
trying to say that the earth was
billions of years old which is
ridiculous I exalted the age of the
earth how its young I even explained
Einstein's theory of relativity and
light and how it applies to starlight
why we can see starlight that's billions
of light years away even though the
earth in the universe are only 6,000
years of age and so I explained all this
and but anyway as the crowd was starting
to get a little bit more contentious
than than I wanted it because I really
wanted the spirit of you how to fall in
sobriety yah just let me start singing
so I just started singing out springtime
in summer spring time if all that's and
then I started just singing out some 119
I literally just began to go for the
entire solemn just singing it out and
singing out first John 3 6 through 11
and as I began to sing and sing and sing
about Yahshua's death and burial and
resurrection I just saying and saying it
almost turned into like a Broadway
cantata as I was just singing and the
crowd began to you know dissipate and
then for like the last hour I only had a
small crowd again for maybe maybe 20
students or so it may be a little more
but but the students that were there the
spirit of yah was falling upon them
there was this one woman sitting in
front of me that I could tell her face
is very sober she was coming in a
conviction of sin another female student
a young woman named Holly she had
emailed me a couple days ago and said
that she wanted to repent to me for
mocking me and she came up to me today
and she said I just want to say again
I'm sorry and I said hey that's okay I
said join our skype fellowship and I
gave her a card so hopefully she'll join
our skype fellowship but I just began to
continue to preach I I read through the
entire psalm 119 not just once but twice
that's right all hundred and seventy
plus vs of psalm 119 I read through
twice i read through a lot of yahshua's
words in the book of John I like the
story of the Samaritan woman the story
where he says you must be born again
with Nicodemus I read a lot of 1st John
362 11 preached the Torah preached
repentance you know Ted an elder in my
skype fellowship congregation we meet
every night he had said he wanted at
least two fish to be saved today to two
souls and I i have a feeling there were
more than to the spirit of yah fluff
load at the campus today truly the
spirit of jezebel feminism has been
defiled and the beast does not overcome
the truth of torah and the spirit has
overcome at psu no there's not a huge
revival where a bunch of people are
repenting but there's those few i think
that are coming under conviction of sin
and i think students are beginning to
just surrender their hearts to Yahshua
this is all I could ask for as the
revival continues at PSU this is daniel
john lee with tour restoration
ministries the websites ww
spirit and tour com we've changed the

tonight and every night on skype be
there or be square it's a video

breaks loose you want to be with the
brothers and sisters in Messiah
hallelujah hallelujah the 29th day of
the eighth months and I stressed the

and then we head into the ninth month
the month of judgment this is daniel
